title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Syntax of programming languages, semantics of programming languages, procedure oriented and object oriented programming languages, data types, scope, extent and allocation of storage of variables, statements, blocks, procedures, functions. Comparative study of programming languages. Programming in various application areas.
